settings.setting:
Friends,
I just created a petition: [title], because I care deeply about this very important issue.
I'm trying to collect [signature_goal] signatures, and I could really use your help.
To read more about what I'm trying to do and to sign my petition, click here: [petition_url]
It'll just take a minute!
Once you're done, please ask your friends to sign the petition as well. Grassroots movements succeed because people like you are willing to spread the word!
Thanks
Read up on the latest petitions on Site Name.

phrases.phrase: Deleting a category will delete all petitions that belong to that category.
No petition categories have been created.
Can browse and view the petition module?

<title>Petition Time Stamp</title><info>Controls time stamps for petition entries.
If using the default setting and the default template the time stamp will appear under each petition title and will look similar to:
Posted June 22, 2008 by Raymond Benc</info>
<title>Petition Meta Keywords</title><info>Meta keywords that will be displayed on sections related to the Petition module.</info>
<title>Petition Meta Description</title><info>Meta description added to pages related to the Petition module.</info>

<title>How Long is the Preview</title><info>How much of the petition to show on the main petition section?
Value is in characters, i.e.: 15 would show something like: "Lorem ipsum dol..."
0 = No limit</info>
Can edit petitions added by other users?
Can delete petitions added by other users?
Are you sure you want to delete this petition?
Fill in a title for your petition

How many minutes should a user wait before they can submit another petition?
Note: Setting it to "0" (without quotes) is default and users will not have to wait.
You are posting a little too soon.

Can set an "Allow List" when adding a new petition?
Note: This setting will give the user the feature to add a list of users that can view their petition.
Control who can see this petition.
Can control if a user can add a comment on their petition or simply disable comments?
Control who can comment on this petition.
The petition you are looking for cannot be found.
This petition is pending an Admins approval.
The petition you are trying to approve is not valid.
Your petition has been approved on {site_title}.
Your petition has been approved on {site_title}. To view this petition, follow the link below: {link}
Specify how many points the user will receive when adding a new petition.
Your petition has been marked as spam. It will have to be approved by an Admin before it is displayed publicly.
We do not allow links in titles.
Approve petitions before they are publicly displayed?
Fill in a target for your petition
enter the name of an individual, organization who you want to petition.
Separate multiple emails with a comma
what do you want them to do
what do you actually want the target to do
Fill in a petition goal for your petition
provide a brief info about this petition
Can control if a user can sign on their petitions?
Control who can sign on this petition.
Send personal thank-you note to each signer of this petition Signature goal
Signature Goal must be a integer number.
posted a comment on {gender} petition {title}
posted a comment on {user_name}'s petition "{title}"
{full_name} liked your petition "{title}" To view this petition follow the link below: {link}
{owner_full_name} added a new petition "{title}".
{user_name} added a new comment on their own petition.
{user_name} added a new comment on your petition.
{user_name} added a new comment on {item_user_name}'s petition.
{full_name} commented on your petition "{title}". To see the comment thread, follow the link below: {link}
{full_name} commented on {gender} petition "{title}". To see the comment thread, follow the link below: {link}
{full_name} commented on {petition_full_name}'s petition "{title}". To see the comment thread, follow the link below: {link}
Unable to post a comment on this item due to privacy settings.
No petitions have been added yet.
Be the First to Create a Petition.
{full_name} wrote a comment on your petition "{petition_title}".
Are you sure? This will delete all petitions that belong to this category and cannot be undone.
The petition you are trying to feature is not valid.
Max file size for petition photos in kilobits (kb). (1000 kb = 1 mb) For unlimited add "0" without quotes.
You can upload a JPG, GIF or PNG file.
The file size limit is {filesize} kb. If your upload does not work, try uploading a smaller picture.
You do not have sufficient permission to modify this petition.
Click to set as default image
Successfully added photo(s) to your petition.
{full_name} invited you to "{title}". To check out this petition, follow the link below: {link}
{full_name} invited you to an petition.
Unable to view this item due to privacy settings.

You can add some special keyvars:
[title]: Petition title
[petition_url]: Petition URL
[full_name]: Full name of petition owner
[petition_goal]: Petition goal
[short_description]: Petition main description
[description]: Petition short description
[start_time]: Petition start date
[end_time]: Petition end date
[total_sign]: Total signed
[signature_goal]: Signature goal
[target]: Target name

You can add some special keyvars:
[title]: Petition title
[petition_url]: Petition URL
[full_name]: Full name of petition owner
[petition_goal]: Petition goal
[short_description]: Petition main description

[start_time]: Petition start date
[end_time]: Petition end date
[total_sign]: Total signed
[signature_goal]: Signature goal
[target]: Target name

just signed this petition and I want to send the letter again.
